	//openbook strategy
	static const std::array<Move, 4> open_11 = { Move{ 27, 28 }, { 9, 29 }, { 2, 38 }, { 38, 39 } };
	static const std::array<Move, 4> open_21 = { Move{ 53, 52 }, { 71, 51 }, { 78, 42 }, { 42, 41 } };
